title__starting_from_free_buy_if_you_nee: Starting from free. Buy if you need it.
Having a hardware wallet is not required to use the app.
There is no cap on the amount of coins you can deposit.
Our products and services have been tried and tested by customers all over the world.
In order to use a hardware wallet, you will only need to pay a small one-time fee.
